en-US.taskbar-tabs-social-callout-title: Keep your favorite feeds in your taskbar
en-US.taskbar-tabs-social-callout-subtitle: Launch your social sites like an app in a streamlined window protected by Firefox.
en-US.taskbar-tabs-chat-callout-subtitle: Launch your chat sites like an app in a streamlined window protected by Firefox.

de.taskbar-tabs-social-callout-title: Behalten Sie Ihre Lieblings-Feeds in der Taskleiste
de.taskbar-tabs-social-callout-subtitle: Starten Sie Ihre sozialen Websites wie eine App in einem optimierten Fenster, das von Firefox geschützt wird.
de.taskbar-tabs-chat-callout-subtitle: Starten Sie Ihre Chats wie eine App in einem optimierten Fenster, das von Firefox geschützt wird.

en-CA.taskbar-tabs-social-callout-title: Keep your favorite feeds in your taskbar
en-CA.taskbar-tabs-social-callout-subtitle: Launch your social sites like an app in a streamlined window protected by Firefox.
en-CA.taskbar-tabs-chat-callout-subtitle: Launch your chat sites like an app in a streamlined window protected by Firefox.

en-GB.taskbar-tabs-social-callout-title: Keep your favorite feeds in your taskbar
en-GB.taskbar-tabs-social-callout-subtitle: Launch your social sites like an app in a streamlined window protected by Firefox.
en-GB.taskbar-tabs-chat-callout-subtitle: Launch your chat sites like an app in a streamlined window protected by Firefox.

fr.taskbar-tabs-social-callout-title: Conservez vos fils d’actualité préférés dans votre barre des tâches
fr.taskbar-tabs-social-callout-subtitle: Ouvrez vos sites de réseaux sociaux sous forme d’application dans une fenêtre épurée et sécurisée par Firefox.
fr.taskbar-tabs-chat-callout-title: Discutez depuis la barre des tâches
fr.taskbar-tabs-chat-callout-subtitle: Ouvrez vos sites de discussion sous forme d’application dans une fenêtre épurée et sécurisée par Firefox.

it.taskbar-tabs-social-callout-title: Mantieni i tuoi feed preferiti nella barra delle applicazioni
it.taskbar-tabs-social-callout-subtitle: Apri i tuoi social preferiti come un’app, in una finestra ottimizzata e protetta da  Firefox.
it.taskbar-tabs-chat-callout-subtitle: Apri le tue chat preferite come un’app, in una finestra ottimizzata e protetta da Firefox.
